definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Am 4:9 locusts (coll.)—abs. [[גׇּזׇם]] Joe 1:4, Joe 2:25, Am 4:9; —always as devouring, devastating, Joe 1:4 (‖[[אַרְבֶּה]], [[יֶלֶק]], [[חָסִיל]]) Joe 2:25 (‖ id.); Am 4:9 alone: your gardens and your vineyards, and your fig-tres and your olive-trees [[יאׁכַל הַגׇּזׇם]].
